channel.title: OpenStack Newton on StackStorm
channel.description: Recent content in OpenStack Newton on StackStorm

item.title: OpenStack Summit Barcelona Preview: Resiliency, High Availability, Adaptability, and Self-Healing with StackStorm Event-Driven Automation
item.description:
StackStorm at OpenStack Summit Highlights:

  • Booth: B34 (You’ll find us in the Brocade Booth)
  • StackStorm Theater Presentation: StackStorm and OpenStack: Two Practical Cases for Event Driven Automation; Wed 26 11:20am-11:45am, P0 – Marketplace Theater
  • Mirantis Session: Sleep Better at Night: OpenStack Cloud Auto­-Healing
  • Design Summit: Mistral Working Sessions
